## AUDIT-10 vs DTC

Psychologists engaged in research focusing on alcohol consumption patterns often find themselves comparing questionnaires like AUDIT-10 (Alcohol use disorders identification test) and Drinking to Cope (DTC). The AUDIT-10 vs DTC comparison allows for a better understanding of the frequency, volume, and psychological motivation behind drinking behavior.

## Compare the items in AUDIT-10 and DTC

* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#_In0sIHsicXVlc3Rpb25fdGV4dCI6ICJIb3cgb2Z0ZW4gZG8geW91IGhhdmUgc2l4IG9yIG1vcmUgdW5pdHMgb2YgYWxjb2hvbCBvbiBvbmUgb2NjYXNpb24__" target="harmonyapp">Import AUDIT-10 and DTC into Harmony and harmonise them</a> - find similarities between the two instruments using our AI platform
* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#_In0sIHsicXVlc3Rpb25fdGV4dCI6ICJIb3cgb2Z0ZW4gZG8geW91IGhhdmUgc2l4IG9yIG1vcmUgdW5pdHMgb2YgYWxjb2hvbCBvbiBvbmUgb2NjYXNpb24__" target="harmonyapp">Import just AUDIT-10 into Harmony</a> - compare AUDIT-10 with other instruments
* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#_In0sIHsicXVlc3Rpb25fdGV4dCI6ICJIb3cgb2Z0ZW4gZG8geW91IGhhdmUgc2l4IG9yIG1vcmUgdW5pdHMgb2YgYWxjb2hvbCBvbiBvbmUgb2NjYXNpb24__" target="harmonyapp">Import just DTC into Harmony</a> - compare DTC with other instruments


However, comparing different questionnaires, or harmonisation, can be a time-consuming and subjective process. Harmony software is an effective solution that simplifies such comparison tasks. This tool, developed specifically for psychologists and social scientists, leverages the power of artificial intelligence to harmonise questionnaire items. It supports the comparison of AUDIT-10 and DTC, providing an extensive assessment of the correlation between questions in these instruments.

Harmony utilizes large language models to calculate a percentage match between each item on the AUDIT-10 and DTC questionnaire, providing objective results and easing the burden on the researchers. The use of Harmony for AUDIT-10 vs DTC comparison and harmonisation not only saves valuable time but also enhances the effectiveness of cross-study and cohort analyses. Moreover, Harmony's capabilities are not limited by language barriers, and it allows for the comparison of instruments in multiple languages. So, for a seamless AUDIT-10 vs DTC comparison, use Harmony, and move a step closer to insightful research findings.
